QuestData.Title: The Fall of Shai Hu
QuestData.Description:
I can hear the voice of the Mere - it has been purified.
But, this chapter in my people's history will never be closed - not until we defeat Shai Hu.
He has retreated to the central island in the Mere, corrupting our holiest of sites.
Beware - he is strong. But, after all we have done, I am confident we will be stronger.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The corrupter of the Inkgill Jinyu. He must die if they are to be redeemed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Shai Hu. He can be found at the Waterspeaker's Sanctuary, the island in the center of Inkgill Mere in Kun-Lai Summit.
QuestData.RewardText:
Thank you, $n. You have assured that this corruption will not spread, and that my people - those who have not been corrupted - will be able to live on and found a new village.
Our history will live on. You have done more for us than we could have ever hoped.
Thank you, friend.
